metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9324 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The GenericInterface in OTRS Help Desk 3.2.x before 3.2.17, 3.3.x before 3.3.11, and 4.0.x before 4.0.3 allows remote authenticated users to access and modify arbitrary tickets via unspecified vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9324` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

otrs - 3.3.11-1
otrs2 - 3.3.11-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.3.11-1').
